name: Hotel: A Resort Simulator
description:
The first hotel simulator to take you behind the scenes of idyllic holidays. Your mission is to provide unforgettable memories for guests while managing your hotel and growing your business!

  • Build your dream hotel

    Choose the ideal location, design and build all the facilities required (reception, restaurants, suites…), and decorate them to suit your tastes.

  • Pamper your guests!

    Pick up your guests from the harbour and make sure their entire stay is as comfortable as possible to gain the best online reviews. Cleaning, storage, transportation, food, entertainment: all aspects of their holiday are your responsibility.

  • Manage your establishment and staff

    As the manager, you have many responsibilities: hiring staff, organizing tasks to be done in the hotel, handling reservations, preparing menus, optimising profits, investing in new equipment… Your decisions will determine the success of your business!
